description: An experiment in pure design by film artists Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart. Lines, ruled directly on film, move with precision and grace against a background of changing colours in response to music specially composed for the film. Accompanied by American folk musician Pete Seeger on wind and string instruments. (Awards: Venice; Edinburgh; London)
